entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
